active_reservation_card.card_description: Show active reservations and end them.
active_reservation_card.title: Title (optional)
active_reservation_card.pick_new_end_time: Select a new end time first
active_reservation_card.end_time_after_start: End time must be after start time
active_reservation_card.could_not_adjust_end_time: Could not adjust the reservation end time

new_reservation_card.card_description: Create a new reservation with favorites support.
new_reservation_card.set_meldnummer_error: Select a `service` in the editor, or set `config_entry_id` manually. Alternatively, set `entity: sensor.thehague_parking_*_reservations` or `favorites_entity: sensor.thehague_parking_*_favorieten`.
new_reservation_card.missing_favorites_warning: No favorites found. Select a `service`, or set `favorites_entity: sensor.thehague_parking_*_favorieten` manually to show favorites.
new_reservation_card.name: Name
new_reservation_card.favorite_name_required_error: Enter a name to save the favorite
